mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Posts ( plan_id, user_id, start_date, end_date, title, content, current_members ) VALUES ( #{planId}, #{userId}, #{startDate}, #{endDate}, #{title}, #{content}, #{currentMembers} )
mapper.select: SELECT id, plan_id AS planId, user_id AS userId, start_date AS startDate, end_date AS endDate, title, content, current_members AS currentMembers, created_at AS createdAt, updated_at AS updatedAt FROM Posts ORDER BY created_at DESC
